page.title: 19An Eighty Year Old Geranium
page.content: Just one year ago a new venture appeared in{Hatherop,}a market garden. Since 1705 the Castle had a two and a half acre garden to supply it with food. As the castle has not been used as a family house for the last thirty years the garden has become overgrown. The new proprietor intends to grow his crops organically, that is without the use of fertilizers, pesticides or weedkillers which may be harmful to the soil.Although the garden is producing crops, it is not yet in full production. It will take another two years before all the ground is cultivated. In one of the greenhouses there ia an enormous geranium. It is almost twenty foot high and more than forty foot in width. It is thought to have been planted before 1900.
